verses.verseString: In the name of God, the Gracious, the Merciful.
verses.verseStringReplacedWithAllah: In the name of Allah, the Gracious, the Merciful.

verses.verseString: Say, “I take refuge in the Lord of Daybreak.
From the evil of what He created.
And from the evil of the darkness when it settles.
And from the evil of those who blow on knots.
And from the evil of the envier when he envies.”
